title: Robotic Arm (AI-based Control)
description: Capstone build with custom PCB, ESP32 control, and AI face tracking.
highlights: Designed & 3D-printed components in SolidWorks; custom PCB and motor control on ESP32.
Bluetooth & wireless USB comms for synchronized motion between remote and arm.
Integrated Google Face Mesh for dynamic user-aware tracking.

title: Geographic Information System (Top 1 Optimization)
description: Interactive C++ GIS with real-time data and optimized routing.
highlights: Implemented Dijkstra, A*, Greedy; experimented with RL for path optimization.
Integrated OpenStreetMap & Libcurl APIs; responsive GUI with GTK.

title: Crazy Arcade
description: Real-time tile engine on FPGA in bare-metal C with memory-mapped VGA/PS-2 peripherals and deterministic, timer-driven events.
highlights: Timer interrupts + compact FSMs orchestrate bomb lifecycle independently of frame rate.
Bit-packed BRAM tile grid; explosion propagation via four-way ray-casting.
VSYNC-aligned double-buffered VGA; PS/2 scan-code parsing; fixed-timestep loop.
